General.Name: Petronas Dagangan Bhd
General.Description: PETRONAS Dagangan Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, engages in retailing and marketing of downstream petroleum products primarily in Malaysia. It operates through Retail, Commercial, and Others segments. The company offers liquefied natural gas (LPG) for household, commercial, and industrial segments; lubricant products, including passenger car motor, motorcycle, and heavy duty engine oil, as well as automotive function fluid; credit and gift cards; car perfumes and fresheners under the Airtech Pininfarina, Odor Cancel, Airtech Evolution, Fresca Foglia, and Zen Essence; EV charging stations; Setel, a fuel e-payment app; Deliver2Me for shopping from vehicles while refueling; mobile fuel delivery services; and lubricants, commercial fuels, industrial LPG, aviation fuels, diesel, bitumen, industry fuel oil, marine fuel oil, and fuel for sparks ignition engines, as well as virtual pipeline system for liquified natural gas for industrial and commercial sectors. It also operates fuel stations; café Mesara; Makan@Mesra, an eatery corner; and Segar@Mesra, a farmer-to-consumer concept of locally farmed fresh produce. In addition, the company provides technical consultancy, courier, and payment services; operates as a general carrier and forwarding agent; manages and operates Mesra C-stores, and food and beverage stores; and issues and operates electronic money. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. PETRONAS Dagangan Berhad is a subsidiary of Petroliam Nasional Berhad.
